description: Try our easy to follow Turkey & Avocado Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Turkey & Avocado Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g mixed toasted seeds (such as pumpkin and sunflower)

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the turkey. Peel, stone and dice the avocado and mix it with the mustard and cress and salad leaves in a large bowl. Add the turkey and toasted seeds and stir to combine.
Make the dressing by whisking together the apple juice, yoghurt, honey and mustard. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat. Serve the salad with toasted wholegrain rye bread or rolled up in flat breads.
